titleNullable: COVID-19 News by CDC and WHO
subtitleNullable: All CDC and WHO newsroom releases concerning COVID-19
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This contains all the press releases, conference call transcripts, official statements, and other newsroom details published by CDC and WHO. 


### Method

Everything was scraped using webscraper.io, and pre-processed with pandas. I did not modify any of the original content. The latest scrape was on April 22.

### Sources

All the WHO data were retrieved from [here](https://www.who.int/news-room/detail/search-results?indexCatalogue=genericsearchindex1&searchQuery=*&wordsMode=AllWords&healthtopic=b6bd35a3cf4f48518e8085cb0068335b), and the CDC data were taken from [here](https://www.cdc.gov/media/dpk/diseases-and-conditions/coronavirus/coronavirus-2020.html).
